Sterling LaneÂ®
Inspired by the Romance and Spirit of the West
Jewelry | Bridal | Accessories

Montana Silversmiths
Sterling LaneÂ®
Jewelry, Bridal and Accessories Inspired by the Romance and the Spirit of the West The natural beauty of Montana offers a stunning backdrop of inspiration for Montana Silversmiths Sterling Lane Collection of authentic western themed jewelry, bridal and accessories. Sterling Lane jewelry and bridal offers timeless designs in solid sterling silver accentuated by high quality stones and SwarovskiÂ® Zirconia. To expand the Sterling Lane Collection, we are introducing bridal rings for women and men. In addition, Sterling Lane will offer cake toppers, accessories and personalized wedding party gifts to enhance wedding themes centered around the romance of the West. The intricate beauty of each piece lies in the depth of design details and its versatility to be worn, not only as a bridal item, but also as an accent piece of beauty and design for everyday elegance. Sterling Lane embodies authentic, genuine designs in jewelry, bridal, and accessories, for life changing events and moments to cherish.
Sterling Silver
Solid sterling silver crafted in authentic styling with high-quality accents.
Jewelry Store Display Warranty Merchandising Help your Sterling Lane Jewelry Collection stand apart using the specially designed jewelry store merchandiser that fits right in your Montana Silversmiths case.
Since 1895, SwarovskiÂ® has applied their technical expertise to the finest raw materials. With historic innovation, SwarovskiÂ® applies ideal diamond-cut standards to their Zirconia.
SwarovskiÂ® Zirconia
Montana Silversmiths stands behind the quality and workmanship of our products proven with our offer of a limited lifetime warranty on our Sterling Lane products against manufacturerâ€™s defects. See our warranty policy for details.

â€œTwo Trails Become One Roadâ€ In tails and white, youâ€™ll leave tonight, with the one that you love so, You must allow us one last chance to tell you what we know. As feather legged horses strain against each single tree, Lifeâ€™s heavy burdens shared by two are drawn more easily. And though youâ€™re now together, yoked in love and grace, Push not against each other, respect the others trace. Love shared is not divided, but multiplied you see, Itâ€™s the only time I know, when one and one adds up to three... Or four, or five, or six, or even seven, But be assured each red round face is an angel straight from heaven. Itâ€™s time to take the parents love, store it safely, deep within, A new page in your book of life you must today begin. As together you ride separately, two trails become one road, That leads toward your destiny, God bless and share your load. - Steve Miller

Your wedding is the most important event of your life. Let Montana Silversmiths help acknowledge the special people in your life as you ask them to stand up beside you. Create a custom piece for your groomsmen and bridal party with a variety of options using a favorite symbol, initials, or brand to personalize your relationship and big day! Montana Silversmiths Personalized Bridal Gifts are a unique treasured way to say thank you.
